itunes:title: 352: Fixing Your Mind, Mind Mechanics, and Mental Health, w/ Dr. Karlyn Pleasants and Megan Harrison
title: 352: Fixing Your Mind, Mind Mechanics, and Mental Health, w/ Dr. Karlyn Pleasants and Megan Harrison
itunes:author: Jocko DEFCOR Network
description:
Dr. Karlyn Pleasants is a clinical Psychologist who specializes in adult and adolescent psychotherapy. She is also the Chief Clinical Advisor and a managing partner at Anew Treatment Center, Scottsdale AZ.

Megan Harrison holds a master's degree in Marriage and Family Therapy with experience in transgenerational trauma and mental illness.



Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/jocko-podcast/exclusive-content
content:encoded:
